body_html:
Yes. This is what I installed. Do you know the URI to the correct installer? $sudo wget http://developer.download.nvidia.com/compute/cuda/7_0/Prod/local_installers/cuda_7.0.28_linux.run $sudo chmod 700 ./cuda_7.0.28_linux.run $sudo ./cuda_7.0.28_linux.run $sudo update-initramfs -u $sudo reboot
…

This is what I installed.  Do you know the URI to the correct installer?

body:
Yes.

This is what I installed.  Do you know the URI to the correct installer?

$sudo wget http://developer.download.nvidia.com/compute/cuda/7_0/Prod/local_installers/cuda_7.0.28_linux.run
$sudo chmod 700 ./cuda_7.0.28_linux.run
$sudo ./cuda_7.0.28_linux.run
$sudo update-initramfs -u
$sudo reboot

> On Mar 31, 2017, at 10:52 AM, Jonathan J. Helmus <notifications@github.com> wrote:
> 
> CUDA 7.5 requires driver version 352.xx or newer but you seem to be using an older version, can you update the driver?
>
